title: Add a list to The Registry enabled badges
description: Someone requested to add a list to The Registry enabled badges.

descriptions: Select this if you think the list complies with the required criteria and should be added.
Select this if you think the list does not comply with the required criteria and should not be added.

question: Does the list comply with the required criteria?
